descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 25 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
❗️❗️❗️✨ **Are you ready to create your own little planet?** ✨❗️❗️❗️

...👇👇👇

🌴Little Planet offers endless possibilities, where you can unleash your creativity and build the planet of your dreams!!🪐

There are other friends waiting for you on the little planet! We believe you will be able to create an ideal home filled with fun and vitality!!🥂
[media]

On this unique planet, you will explore a magical world and craft your own home from scratch! But be careful! The hard work might exhaust you, so don't forget to eat and sleep while building your dream home.😵🍎🍐🍊
[media]

On the beach, you can experience the thrill of fishing adventures! Take a look at what's here - fishing rods, aquariums... and even a giant shark
🦈😱?!
[media]

As a planet creator, you will have unique abilities to create rivers, hills, and even waterfalls across this vast land.🎨 Feel free to unleash your creativity and build your one-of-a-kind home.🌍
[media]

We also has a vibrant public area with fun attractions like a Ferris wheel, carousel, and mysterious maze.🎡 It's the perfect place to invite your fellow planet creators to capture joy-filled moments together.📸
[media]

Our planet is currently in the early access stage, which means you will be among the first to explore this land and participate in its development. 

Please share your planet creations and any feedback on our **Discord** server (**discord.gg/littleplanet**). We eagerly look forward to your participation!💖
